thread.title: Dutch man brings dance music to China
thread.title_full: Dutch man brings dance music to China - Telegraph

author: Huan Cao
title: Dutch man brings dance music to China
text: More news, analysis and features at China Watch Paul Neuteboom, from Holland, has been in China for four years. Paul leads a company called Modern Art Entertainment, which is a platform for electronic music in China. Electronic music in China is still in the early stages, he says. “It’s definitely still not yet a platform where everybody knows what it is.” “When they experience it, you see that a big proportion of the young people say ‘yes, this is the sound I’ve been looking for’.” For Paul, the most joyful moment would be when he watches people enjoy themselves at his events. And that's the moment he feels that all the efforts and hard work had all paid off. “There’s this moment where you stop and look around and you see that people are having fun and enjoying themselves. It’s that 10 second realisation that makes you think ‘yes, this is why I’m here’.” The video below illustrates Paul's story. This article was originally produced and published by China Daily . View the original article here . • Read more about Chinese current affairs at China Watch
